overview: Set in the cutthroat, boy-dominated world of high school debate where tomorrowâ€™s leaders are groomed, GIRL TALK tells the timely story of five girls on a diverse, top-ranked Massachusetts high school debate team as they strive to become the best debaters in the United States on their own terms.
tagline: One Champion Debate Team, Four Defining Years, Five Determined Girls.
title: Girl Talk
